main: ^Carabao Festival or also known as the Kneeling Carabao Festival and carabaos or also known as Water Buffalo.

c-0: ^These animals are very important for farmers because they help till the land.
^Celebrated in Bulacan during the month of May during the feast of the Patron Saint of farmers, San Isidro Labrador.

^The carabaos are decorated with ribbons and attached to carts, then farmers lead their carabaos to the church square to be part of the procession. At the church, the carabaos kneel for their blessings.
